author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Move FileService variable in the code rather than as a class member and use fillDescription in SimG4CMS/ShowerLibraryProducer and SimG4CMS/Calo

#### PR validation:

Use runTheMatrix test workflows and cfg's in the test area

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim101 Move FileService variable in the code rather than as a class member and use fillDescription in SimG4CMS/ShowerLibraryProducer and SimG4CMS/Calo
